REQ: Brussels 2007 (Aerosoft)

Hi great download but i have a problem. when i go below 200 feet the taxi ways and runway dissapear but it doesnt happen at the other end of the airport. it this because i havnt got service pack 1 installed?
Seed Pleeeez :)

Per the instructions in the readme:

1. go to C:\Documents and Settings\Username\Local Settings\Temp

That's an XP value.  In Vista, I have traced it as far as /users/username . . . . the only folder in my username is called "appdata".  Can this addon even be installed in Vista?  If so may I have the correct path please?

Thanks alot... works great... But can someone please please upload the Twin otter fsx from aerosoft
